content: **serenity simple textured crochet pattern** the serenity a textured sweater is made using a combination of basic stitches making it a great project for beginner and experienced crocheters alike the pattern is easy to follow and includes detailed instructions for adjusting the size to fit your body so you can make a sweater that fits you perfectly **yarn** - hobbii lolipop #4 20% wool 80% acrylic 382 yards per 7 1 oz/200g ball **any other worsted weight yarn can be substituted** estimated total yardage 900 1100 1200 1380 1580 1680 1780 1880 2180 yards hook and other materials 6 mm crochet hook gauge 16 sts over 9 rounds = 5 around by 4 in height before blocking go up or down hook size if necessary to obtain a gauge difficulty level intermediate terms - us terminology finished measurement size s and color codes - xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl bust measurement 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 length of top 21 21 21 21 23 23 23 25 25 armhole measurement 15 5 16 16 5 17 17 5 18 18 5 19 19 5 the modeled garment is shown in small with negative ease
